Necross/ Splattercannon/ ????:

Splattercannon readied his beam cannons and his beam gatling rifle.  
He held his position, waiting for the word to attack.

Necross decended and rested in a giant tree, high above the ground.  
He watched and waited for the Maximals to show up.  He heard stories 
about the Autobots defeating Unicron and his minions, so he wanted to 
see how their decendants handled new and improved minions.

Unicron's final minion strode through the insids of the Chaosbringer, 
bored.  She entered a chamber where the Sweeps stayed.  SHe, being 
the new Sweep commander, was met with the Sweeps standing at 
attention as she walked past them.  She reached the other end of the 
room and sat in a throne like seat.  She looked on over her hunters, 
a smile upon her lips.
"As you were."
As the Sweeps returned to doing whatever they were a moment ago, the 
Sweep commander activated a viewscreen.  On it the locations of her 
five brethren appeared, and she watched over them, in case she 
actually needed to help.
